Translations.Text: Nihsandeha manusera bela -- take srsti kara hayeche byastasamasta kare
yakhana kharapa abastha take sparsa kare takhana atiba byathatura
ara yakhana sacchalata take sparsa kare takhana hara-kipate
tara byatita yara muchalli
yara tadera namayera prati sbatahnisthabana
ara yara tadera dhanasampattite nirdista adhikara rekheche
bhikharira o bancitera jan'ya
ara yara bicarera dinake satya bale grahana kare
ara yara tadera prabhura sasti samparke khoda bhitasantrasta
niscaya tadera prabhura sasti prasantidayaka naya
ara yara nijera'i tadera angika-kartabyabali samparke yatnabana
tabe nijedera dampati athaba tadera danahata yadera dhare rekheche tadera chara, kenana seksetre tara nindaniya nahe
kintu ye era ba'ire ya'oya kamana kare tahale tara nijera'i habe simalanghanakari.
Ara yara khoda tadera amanata sanbandhe o tadera angikara sanbandhe sajaga thake
ara yara sbayam tadera saksyadane supratisthita
ara yara nijera tadera namaya sanbandhe sada yatnabana
tara'i thakabe jannate parama sam'manita abasthaya.
Kintu ki hayeche tadera yara abisbasa posana kare, ye tara tomara dike udagriba haye chute asache
dana dika theke o bama dika theke, daledale
tadera madhyera pratyeka loka'i ki asa kare ye take prabesa karano habe anandamaya udyane
kakhana'i na. Nihsandeha amara ki diye tadera garechi ta tara jane.
Kintu na, ami udayacalera o astacalera prabhura name sapatha karachi ye amara alabat samartha
ye amara tadera ceye bhalodera diye badale deba, ara amara parajita habara na'i.
Sejan'ya tadera chere da'o galpagujaba o kheladhulo karate ye paryanta na tara tadera se'i dinatira saksat paya yara sanbandhe tadera oyada kara hayechila
se'idina tara kabaragulo theke beriye asabe byastasamasta haye, yena tara ekati laksyasthalera dike dhabita hayeche
tadera cokha habe abanata, hinata tadera acchanna karabe. Emanata'i se'idina yara bisaye tadera oyada kara hayechila.
Nihsandeha amara nuh‌ke tamra lokadalera kache pathiyechilama e'i bale -- ''tomara lokadalake satarka kare da'o tadera upare marmantuda sasti asabara age.’’
Tini balechilena -- ''he amara sbajati! Nihsandeha ami tomadera jan'ya ekajana spasta satarkakari
e bisaye ye tomara allah‌ra upasana karo o tamke bhaya-bhakti karo, ara amake mene calo.

Tini tomadera papagulora katakata ksama karabena ebam tomadera birama debena eka nirdharita kala paryanta. Nihsandeha allah‌ra nirdharana kara kala yakhana ese pare takhana ta pichiye de'oya yaya na, -- yadi tomara janate!’’
Tini balalena -- ''amara prabhu! Ami to amara sbajatike rate o dine ahbana karechi
kinta amara daka tadera paliye ya'oya chara ara kichu'i baraya ni.

Ara niscaya yakhana'i ami tadera ahbana karechi yena tumi tadera ksama karate para, tara tadera kanera bhetare tadera angulagulo bhare deya, ara tadera kapara diye nijedera dheke phele, ara gom dhare, ara sagarbe garba kare.
Tarapara ami niscaya tadera ahbana karechi umcu galaya
tarapara niscaya ami tadera kache ghosana karechi, ara ami tadera sange gopane gopana katha balechi
ara ami balechi -- tomadera prabhura kache paritrana khomjo, niscaya tini hacchena parama ksamasila.
Tini tomadera upare brsti pathabena pracura parimane
ara tomadera samrd'dha karabena dhanadaulata o santanasantati diye, ara tomadera jan'ya tairi karabena baganasamuha, ara tomadera jan'ya sthapana karabena nadi-nala.
Tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara allah‌ra paksa theke sresthatba sbikara karate ca'icha na
athaca tini tomadera srsti kare'ichena stare-stare.
Tomara ki laksya kara ni kibhabe allah sata asamanake srsti karechena subin'yastabhabe
ara tadera madhye tini candrake karechena ekati aloka ara suryake baniyechena ekati pradipa.
Ara allah prthibi theke tomadera janmiyechena eka utpadanarupe.
Tarapara tini tomadera tate'i phire pathana, ebam tini tomadera bera kare anabena eka bahiskare.
Ara allah tomadera jan'ya prthibitake karechena subistrta
yena tomara tate calate para prasasta pathe.’’
Nuh balechilena -- ''amara prabhu! Nihsandeha tara amake aman'ya kareche ebam anusarana karache tara yara dhanasampatti o santanasantati ksatisadhana chara tara ara kichu'i baraya ni
ara tara eka birata sarayantra etechilam.’’
Ara tara balechila -- ''tomadera debadebike kichute'i parityaga karo na, ara parityaga karo na oyadake, ebam su'oyake na, ara naya yagusa o iya'uka o nasara-ke.’’
Ara tara anekake pathabhrasta kare'i pheleche. Ara tumi an'yayacaridera bibhranti chara ara kichu'i baraccha na
tadera aparadhera jan'ya tadera dubiye de'oya hayechila, phale tadera dhokano hayechila agune. Sutaram tara allah‌ke bada diye tadera jan'ya kono sahayyakari paya ni.
Ara nuh balechilena -- ''amara prabhu! E'i prthibira buke abisbasidera madhyera eka grhabasike'o abyahati diyo na.
Kenana tumi yadi tadera abyahati da'o tahale tara tomara bandadera bibhranta karabe, ara tara duskrtikari be'imanadera byatita ara karora janma debe na.

Amara prabhu! Amake paritrana karo, ara amara pitamatake, ara ye ke'u amara ghare bisbasi haye prabesa kare take, ara bisbasipurusadera o bisbasinidera. Ara an'yayacaridera ara kichu bariyo na nipata ha'oya byatita.’’
